00048 xFarDicAbout::xFarDicAbout(wxWindow *parent, const wxString& title, const wxPoint& pos, const wxSize& size, wxLocale& locale, long style)
00049        : wxFrame(parent, -1, title, pos, size, style), m_locale(locale)
00050 {    
00051     // set the frame icon    
00052     wxBitmap  micon(_T("/usr/share/xfardic/pixmaps/xfardic32.png"), wxBITMAP_TYPE_PNG);
00053 
00054     if(!micon.Ok()){
00055         micon.LoadFile(_T("/usr/local/share/xfardic/pixmaps/xfardic32.png"), wxBITMAP_TYPE_PNG);
00056     }
00057 
00058     wxIcon wicon;
00059     wicon.CopyFromBitmap(micon);
00060     SetIcon(wicon);  
00061 
00062     layout = new wxNotebook(this, xFarDic_ChangeTab, wxPoint(5,113), wxSize(390,200));
00063 
00064     infopanel =  new wxPanel(layout);
00065     autpanel =  new wxPanel(layout);
00066     licpanel =  new wxPanel(layout);
00067     
00068     //xFarDic Logo
00069     wxBitmap logo(_T("/usr/share/xfardic/pixmaps/xfardic-logo.png"), wxBITMAP_TYPE_PNG);   
00070 
00071     if (!logo.Ok()){
00072         logo.LoadFile(_T("/usr/local/share/xfardic/pixmaps/xfardic-logo.png"), wxBITMAP_TYPE_PNG);       
00073     }        
00074 
00075     (void)new wxStaticBitmap (this, -1, logo, wxPoint(155, 8));
00076   
00077     m_ok = new wxButton(this, wxID_CLOSE, _("&Close"), wxPoint(315,315), wxSize(80,36) );
00078 
00079     //Set Default button
00080     m_ok->SetDefault();
00081 
00082     wxString autmsg, infomsg, titmsg, licmsg;
00083     
00084     autmsg.Printf( _T("%s"),_("Alan Baghumian <alan@technotux.org>\n\nArmen Baghumian <armen@opensourceclub.org>"));
00085 
00086     titmsg.Printf( _T("%s%s"),
00087            _("xFarDic "),
00088            XVERSION);
00089 
00090     infomsg.Printf(_T("%s"),_("Latest News and Updates: http://www.xfardic.org\n\nBug Report/Feature Request: alan@technotux.org\n\nIMPORTANT NOTICE:\nYou can get required XDB word databases from project home page at http://sf.net/projects/xfardic. Without word databases, xFarDic *will not* work."));
00091 
00092     licmsg.Printf(_T("%s"),_("xFarDic is free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 2 of the License, or (at your option) any later version.\n\nxFarDic is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License for more details."));
00093 
00094     m_autlabel = new wxStaticText(autpanel, -1, autmsg, wxPoint(5, 10), wxSize(380,390));
00095     m_infolabel = new wxStaticText(infopanel, -1, infomsg, wxPoint(5, 10), wxSize(380,390));
00096     m_liclabel = new wxStaticText(licpanel, -1, licmsg, wxPoint(5, 10), wxSize(380,390));
00097     m_titlabel = new wxStaticText(this, -1, titmsg, wxPoint(31, 84), wxSize(340,390), wxALIGN_CENTRE);
00098     m_abbox = new wxStaticBox(this, -1, wxT(""), wxPoint(5, 5), wxSize(390,105), wxALIGN_CENTRE);       
00099 
00100     // Setting Label Font
00101     m_font.SetPointSize(15);
00102     m_font.SetWeight(wxBOLD);
00103 
00104     m_titlabel->SetFont(m_font);
00105 
00106     layout->AddPage(infopanel, _("Information"));
00107     layout->AddPage(licpanel, _("License"));    
00108     layout->AddPage(autpanel, _("Authors"));
00109         
00110 }
